Game.Name: Gunstar Super Heroes (Japan)
Game.plot: Gunstar Super Heroes is the sequel to the classic Genesis game Gunstar Heroes. You can play as Red or Blue as you battle through six levels, employing one of three different weapon types. Each character has a slightly different story and balance, adding variety to the 2D platformer gameplay. Gunstar Super Heroes features large bosses and pseudo-3D effects that maximize the graphics capabilities of the Game Boy Advance.Cheat: Defeat Green without having him transformGreen can be easily beaten. He was made so he can only transfrom when your chracter is not looking at him. Simply have your character keep looking at Green and fire and you'll easily beat him without having to deal with his transformed states.Cheat: Defeat Green without having him transformTo kill Orange without him attacking you at all, simply slide into him constantly. He has a lag time before he can move again that is just long enough for you to get in another slide, thus letting you beat Orange effortlessly in order to save health for Green and Golden Silver. He IS, however almost immune to physical attacks, so it's take a minute or so to beat him.
Game.Notes: Your enemies intend to use a powerful crystal to resurrect the devastating God of Ruin and it's up to the Gunstar Heroes, Blue and Red to stop them! Developed by critically acclaimed developer, Treasure, this fast-paced action game will push your Game Boy Advance to the limits! -Blast your way through six intense levels and defeat an evil empire -Choose your hero: play as Red or Blue to combat powerful enemies and gigantic bosses -Amazing visuals create an unforgettable gaming experience
